# Quarto Presentation

## Slide 2

### Key Features

- **Markdown-based**: Write in Markdown, get beautiful slides
- **Code execution**: Run R, Python, or other languages directly
- **Interactive**: Add interactive visualizations
- **Export options**: HTML, PDF, PowerPoint

## Slide 3

### Creating Interactive Visualizations

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| fig-width: 10
#| fig-height: 6

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = hp, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Interactive Car Performance",
       x = "Miles per Gallon",
       y = "Horsepower")
```
